agf.name: Option to assume good faith and rollback the edit
agf.summary: The edit summary used for good faith rollbacks - something like 'Reverting [[WP:AGF|good faith]] edits', linking to the relevant project page

quick-template.name: Option to use a Quick Template

rollbackDoneOptions.latest: Option to go to the latest revision
rollbackDoneOptions.message: Option to send the user a message
rollbackDoneOptions.report: Option to report this user (eg to [[WP:AIV]] on enwiki)
rollbackDoneOptions.mat: Option to open the Multiple Action Tool
rollbackDoneOptions.prefs: Option to open the "More Options" panel
